steps: 2. echo -n YWRtaW4= | base64 -d # on MAC it is -D, which decodes the value and shows 'admin'
3. kubectl get secret mysecret2 -o jsonpath='{.data.username}' | base64 -d  # on MAC it is -D
4. kubectl get secret mysecret2 --template '{{.data.username}}' | base64 -d  # on MAC it is -D
5. kubectl get secret mysecret2 -o json | jq -r .data.username | base64 -d  # on MAC it is -D
